Sinesis falls backward in shock that Dinobot would shoot him instead of the
one that shot his precious Tavatron.....Suukie flipped to his feet and
tackled Sinesis with all of his might.....Sinesis clawed at his eyes....but
it still had no effect.....Suukie picked Sinesis up and above his head and
hurled him into the wall, where a sword was stivking, Suukie had earlier
stuck that sword through the wall and he knew it.....Sinesis and Plintissa
were both now impaled by the raging Suukie........Suukie looked at his
hands..they were bloody...he had caused much destruction...and it made him
feel sad........making him feel sad.....made him want to cause MORE
destruction!.....he walked up and past Dinobot...he walked to Megatron and
stood before him....he pulled out his sword and got ready for combat......he
knew Dinobot was waiting to destroy Megatron, but right now, he didn't
care....he wanted to get a piece of Megyatron himself....... "Megatron, you
will face me!.....until i win, nobody can go FREE!.." he awaited
battle.........
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 30, 2000 6:35 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
>
> * As Dinobot continued to fire at the back of Megatron he noticed Sineses
> pin down Suukie and quickly looked at the Predacon's neck, with split
second
> timing he targeted with his optic site and fired at the attacking Pred.
Even
> though Suukie had fired upon Tavatron and himself he owed the little bot
his
> life, he was the kind of bot  to repay his debts.
> Dinobot continued his assault upon his former commander as he fired at
> Sineses with his optic again, both of his weapons active and deadly.
> He snarled as he took a step towards Megatron, his real target!*
